entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The FlyoutPage toolbar icon does not work in Android and iOS #24480
  • BindableObjects not getting collected causing memory leak, android #24478
  • Changing view size/layout/position does not update the shadow #24476
  • Vianney app #24475
  • XamlC error : Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'key') #24472
  • Flyout page in Android does not show flyout button (burger) consistently #24468
  • Scrollview content is not render properly when the 'Don't keep activities' setting is enabled. #24467
  • Unable to set each child Page Title Font of TabbedPage to desired Font when currentPageChanged Event #24463
  • "Cannot access a disposed object" when reading large JSON from Web #24457
  • ListView inside ContentView inside StackLayout: scrolling does not work #24455

Closed

  • [Testing] CollectionViewInfiniteScroll #24148
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers #24479
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Remove code from iOS that short circuits propagation #24477
    area-navigation
  • [net9.0] Update net9 arcade bits #24473
    area-infrastructure
  • [testing] Fix CollectionView2 UITests #24471
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing
  • Update NavigationPageToolbar.cs #24469
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • Fix App Theme Binding For Non Elements #24465
    community ✨, area-theme
  • [Binding SG] Refactor data models #24462
    area-xaml
  • [Android] Fix item fading when moving between groups in Grouped CollectionView #24461
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

Merged

  • Remove excessive Application API docs #24427
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24474
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • [resizetizer] fix a build performance issue #24453
    area-single-project
  • [Testing] CollectionViewInfiniteScroll Conversion to UI Test #24411
    area-testing
  • [iOS] Bugfix/22469 ios label crash #22487
    community ✨, area-controls-label

Updated

  • [Android] Fix incorrect height of CollectionView when ItemsSource is empty. #24067
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [Android] MediaPicker: Use New Photo Picker #24027
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • Fix for FlexLayout padding issue #24195
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • 894511 : Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24161
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Revert "[ios] fix memory leak in CollectionView cells (#15831)" #24310
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • [iOS] DatePicker (Format='D') #24296
    community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [Android] Prevent the tap that closes an open SwipeView from being propagated to children #24275
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • Fixed the label text from being cut off from the top when the specified LineHeight. #24273
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix inset adjustment #24344
    area-layout
  • [Windows] Bump `Microsoft.Web.WebView2` from `1.0.2592.51` to `1.0.2651.64` #24329
    area-infrastructure, community ✨
  • [Windows] Upgrade Windows App SDK from 1.5.5 to 1.5.6 #24328
    area-infrastructure, community ✨
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Fix shadow consistency on Android and iOS #24415
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • [ci] Build public #24388
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Fix for the CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled. #24431
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • BarBackground with Brush in TabbedPage on theme change #24425
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [Android] Map FlowDirection of shell to PlatformView on Android #23473
    community ✨
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨
  • UI testing doc changes #24165
    area-docs
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #24206
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
    9.0-rc2
  • Fix "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property #24325
    community ✨
  • Entry/Editor completed event is not triggered properly when unfocused #24207
    community ✨
  • [android] improve performance of `ImageHandler.PlatformArrange()` #23665
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-image, t/perf
